item.title: 芝加哥最贵住宅挂牌价 2,350 万美元找到买家
item.description: 芝加哥最昂贵的挂牌房屋在上市多年、四次降价之后终于找到了买家。【原文：Chicago’s most expensive home listing has found a buyer after years on the market and four price cuts.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦与国际货币基金组织达成 70 亿美元贷款新协议
item.description: 巴基斯坦与国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）达成了一项新的 70 亿美元贷款协议，为新任总理谢赫巴兹-谢里夫（Shehbaz Sharif）的政府提供了一些喘息的空间，以支撑其摇摇欲坠的经济并管理其不断增加的债务。【原文：Pakistan reached a new $7 billion loan deal with International Monetary Fund, offering some breathing room for new Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif’s government to shore up its faltering economy and manage its mounting debts.】

item.title: 对冲基金持有的玉米空头数量创历史之最
item.description: 资金经理们持有的美国玉米空头头寸数量创下历史最高纪录，原因是供应更加充足和需求疲软的前景对玉米价格构成了压力。【原文：Money managers are holding the highest number of short positions in US corn on record, as the outlook for more abundant supplies and lackluster demand weigh on prices.】

item.title: 华尔街不断扩大的交易危及指数追踪千亿国际娱乐
item.description: 对于众多主动型经理人和宏观多头来说，渴望已久的股票大涨扩大化将是个好消息。然而，对于那些年复一年在指数追踪工具上挥霍数十亿美元的投资者来说，这可能会给他们带来巨大的痛苦。【原文：A long-coveted broadening of the great stock rally would be good news for a slew of active managers and macro bulls. Yet for investors who’ve been lavishing billions of dollars on index-tracking vehicles — year after year — it threatens a world of pain along the way.】

item.title: 数据追踪机构 Arkham 称德国似乎完成了比特币销售
item.description: 区块链分析公司 Arkham Intelligence 的数据显示，德国政府已于周五发出了最后一枚比特币，可能结束了最近几周市场猜测的数十亿美元的销售。【原文：The German government has sent out its last Bitcoin on Friday, possibly ending billions of dollars in sales that have been the subject of market speculation in recent weeks, according to data from blockchain analysis firm Arkham Intelligence.】

item.title: 伦丁将与必和必拓联合竞购铜矿商 Filo
item.description: 知情人士透露，隆丁矿业公司已就联合竞购铜矿商 Filo 公司一事与必和必拓集团（BHP Group）进行了接洽，此举可解决该公司希望建设的邻近项目的筹资需求。【原文：Lundin Mining Corp. has approached BHP Group about making a joint bid for copper miner Filo Corp., people with knowledge of the matter said, in a move that could solve fundraising needs for a neighboring project it wants to build.】

item.title: 法国 Altice 将媒体销售现金转移到债权人无法触及的地方
item.description: 据知情人士透露，法国 Altice 公司在准备就削减 240 亿欧元（约合 262 亿美元）债务展开讨论时，将近期资产剥离所得的部分收益转移到了债权人无法触及的范围之外。【原文：Altice France moved some of the proceeds from a recent divestiture out of creditors’ reach as it prepares to start discussions over cutting its €24 billion ($26.2 billion) debt pile, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 阿根廷放开石油市场，Vista 从原油销售中获得更多收益
item.description: 阿根廷页岩钻探商 Vista Energy 在第二季度向国内炼油商出售的原油中，有 40% 以上收取出口价格，这是最明显的迹象，表明南美国家在哈维尔-米莱伊总统的领导下放开石油市场的举措正在获得势头。【原文：Argentine shale driller Vista Energy charged export prices for more than 40% of crude that it sold to domestic refiners in the second quarter — the clearest sign yet that the South American country’s moves to free up oil markets under President Javier Milei are gaining momentum.】

item.title: 巴西大豆种植面积将出现近二十年来最慢增长
item.description: 由于价格下跌侵蚀了农民的利润空间，巴西大豆种植面积将出现近二十年来最缓慢的扩张。【原文：Brazil soybean acreage is poised for its slowest expansion in almost two decades as lower prices have eroded farmers’ profit margins.】

item.title: Arbor 房地产信托公司称 "非常确信 "行为正当
item.description: Arbor Realty Trust Inc. 在收到司法部正在调查其贷款行为的报告后表示，该公司确信自己的行为是正确的。【原文：Arbor Realty Trust Inc. says it is confident that it conducts itself properly following a report that the Justice Department is probing its lending practices.】

item.title: 奇货通讯美国经济令人振奋的前景
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读每周一期的《奇货》时事通讯，乔-魏森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）将为您带来他们对市场、金融和经济领域最有趣发展的看法。【原文：Hello and welcome to the weekly Odd Lots newsletter, where Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway bring you their thoughts on the most interesting developments in markets, finance and economy.】

item.title: 比特币价格暴跌后，比特币 ETF 创五月份以来最佳单周流入量
item.description: 一周前，世界上最大的加密货币比特币的价格跌至二月份以来的最低水平，此后，逢低买盘大举回归，比特币交易所交易基金的资金流入量创下了一个多月来的最高纪录。【原文：After the price of the world’s largest cryptocurrency dropped to its lowest level since February a week ago, dip buyers returned in a big way to give Bitcoin exchange-traded funds their best inflows in more than a month.】

item.title: 短期市政债券因通胀疲软和降息预期而飙升
item.description: 通胀放缓的迹象助长了美联储最快将于 9 月降息的猜测，此后，短期市政债券创下了五个月来的最佳表现。【原文：Short-dated municipal bonds posted their best day in five months after signs of slowing inflation fueled speculation the Federal Reserve will be able to cut rates as soon as September.】

item.title: 在作出 "谨慎乐观 "的预测后，纽约银行股价飙升至创纪录水平
item.description: 纽约梅隆银行（Bank of New York Mellon Corp）公布的净利息收入好于预期，并对今年下半年的业绩作出了 "谨慎乐观 "的预测，该公司股价随之飙升，创下历史新高。【原文：Bank of New York Mellon Corp. surged to a record high after reporting better-than-expected net interest income and offering a “cautiously optimistic” forecast for the rest of the year.】

item.title: 大型银行股在盈利失误后暴跌
item.description: 今年以来，美国最大的银行股在大盘上一路高歌猛进，但其业绩却令投资者大失所望，令涨势戛然而止。【原文：The biggest US bank stocks have been trouncing the broader market this year, but the rally got a brake-check from results that underwhelmed investors.】

item.title: StubHub 推迟美国 IPO 上市时间至夏季之后
item.description: 据一位熟知内情的人士透露，StubHub 公司正以不利的市场条件为由，推迟其美国首次公开募股计划，最早也要等到今年夏天之后。【原文：StubHub Inc. is postponing the planned launch of its US initial public offering until after the summer at the earliest, citing unfavorable market conditions, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特拉菲古拉和穆巴达拉计划出售里约铁矿港口
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，特拉菲古拉集团（Trafigura Group）和穆巴达拉资本公司（Mubadala Capital）正在探讨出售约十年前从前亿万富翁埃克-巴蒂斯塔（Eike Batista）手中收购的巴西铁矿石港口运营商。【原文：Trafigura Group and Mubadala Capital are exploring the sale of a Brazilian iron-ore port terminal operator they acquired from former billionaire Eike Batista about a decade ago, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 尼日利亚丹格特炼油厂添加巴西原油
item.description: 尼日利亚在拉各斯附近新建的巨型炼油厂将进口一批巴西原油，使这个非洲最大产油国从海外进口的原油数量再上新台阶。【原文：Nigeria’s giant new refinery near Lagos is to import a cargo of Brazilian crude, adding to the large number of overseas barrels that Africa’s biggest oil-producing nation is taking.】

item.title: 卡森-布洛克称华尔街比以往任何时候都更需要卖空者
item.description: 卡森-布洛克确信，市场 "比以往任何时候都更需要做空者"。问题是：股票的持续上涨和监管方面的新挑战，正在拖累他的看空同行们努力筹集资金。【原文：Carson Block is certain that markets need short sellers “more than ever.” The problem: a relentless stock rally and fresh regulatory challenges are weighing on his bearish peers struggling to raise capital.】

item.title: 普京和习近平为何是 "好朋友"？
item.description: 中俄两国数百年来一直是竞争对手，现在却结成了事实上的联盟，尽管还没有达到习近平主席和普京总统在2022年2月俄罗斯入侵乌克兰前几周刚刚设定的 "无限制 "的高标准。这两个世界上最强大的独裁国家在过去十年间建立的经济、军事和政治联系因战争而得到了发展，尽管中俄两国都希望至少在一定程度上颠覆美国主导的冷战后秩序。【原文：Rivals for centuries, China and Russia now have a de facto alliance, even if it’s failed to reach the high “no limits” bar that Presidents Xi Jinping and Vladimir Putin set just weeks before Russia’s invasion of Ukraine in February 2022. The economic, military and political ties nurtured over the past decade between the world’s two most powerful authoritarian states — both of which aim to upend at least parts of the US-dominated post-Cold War order — have grown as a result of the war, despite Ch】

item.title: 国债市场迎来转折点，美联储减息之路已然明朗
item.description: 全球最大的债券市场正迎来一个转折点，随着交易商开始接受今年三次降息的想法，美国国债一扫 2024 年的跌势。【原文：The world’s biggest bond market is reaching a turning point, with US Treasuries wiping out their 2024 losses as traders start to embrace the idea of three interest-rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 陷入困境的加密货币贷款机构 Abra 收购 Valkyrie 私人信托基金
item.description: 加密货币交易平台 Abra 表示，它已从 Valkyrie Investments 收购了几家私人加密货币信托公司，而就在不久前，Valkyrie Investments 因在没有适当许可证的情况下开展业务而与美国 25 个州的金融监管机构达成了和解。【原文：Crypto trading platform Abra said it had acquired several private cryptocurrency trusts from Valkyrie Investments, shortly before it settled with 25 US state financial regulators for operating without appropriate licenses.】

item.title: Kaszek 和 Andreessen 支持阿根廷金融科技公司 Tapi 完成 2200 万美元融资
item.description: 阿根廷金融技术初创公司 Tapi 在由 Kaszek 领投的 A 轮融资中获得了 2200 万美元的风险投资，公司联合创始人兼首席执行官 Tomas Mindlin 表示，公司将在墨西哥拓展业务。【原文：Argentine financial technology startup Tapi raised $22 million in venture funding in a Series A round led by Kaszek as the company expands its operations in Mexico, co-founder and Chief Executive Officer Tomas Mindlin said.】

item.title: 刚果首次提供来自合资企业的自有钴产品
item.description: 刚果民主共和国的国有矿业公司正试图出售其在一个合资项目中的钴份额，因为该国正在寻求对能源转型关键金属的更多控制权。【原文：Democratic Republic of Congo’s state miner is trying to sell its share of cobalt from a joint-venture project, as the country seeks more control over metals key to the energy transition.】

item.title: 交易员开始押注美联储 9 月超大规模降息
item.description: 债券交易商正在加大押注，认为美联储将在 9 月份降息半个百分点，而不是标准的四分之一个百分点。【原文：Bond traders are ramping up bets that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates by half a percentage point in September instead of the standard quarter-point increment.】

item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，包括高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Banks including Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and Morgan Stanley are lining up more than €6 billion ($6.5 billion) of debt financing for would—be buyers of Sanofi’s consumer health division, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 由于建筑成本上升，ADM 放弃与 LG 化学的合资项目
item.description: 由于成本过高，农业巨头 Archer-Daniels-Midland 公司已停止与 LG 化学有限公司合资生产生物塑料等植物基产品的材料。【原文：Agricultural giant Archer-Daniels-Midland Co. has halted its joint ventures with LG Chem Ltd. to make materials for plant-based products such as bioplastics due to high costs.】
